Fast forward to today, at 11 am all items disappeared except the radio. The cooker which I added to the cart was already labelled as 6units only available, then again disappeared. Poor marketing!!
response: {'title': 'JUMIA', 'snippet': "We're so sorry that you were unhappy with our Anniversary promos. However, we believe you deserve an explanation. We wish you all the best!", 'date': 'June 05, 2024', 'iso_date': '2024-06-05T14:11:35Z'}
